verses.verse: To the chief Musician, <WH5329> A Psalm <WH4210> of David. <WH1732> Blessed <WH835> is he that considereth <WH7919> <WH413> the poor: <WH1800> the LORD <WH3068> will deliver <WH4422> him in time <WH3117> of trouble. <WH7451>

The LORD <WH3068> will preserve <WH8104> him, and keep him alive; <WH2421> and he shall be blessed <WH833> upon the earth: <WH776> and thou wilt not <WH408> deliver <WH5414> him unto the will <WH5315> of his enemies. <WH341>
The LORD <WH3068> will strengthen <WH5582> him upon <WH5921> the bed <WH6210> of languishing: <WH1741> thou wilt make <WH2015> all <WH3605> his bed <WH4904> in his sickness. <WH2483>
I <WH589> said, <WH559> LORD, <WH3068> be merciful <WH2603> unto me: heal <WH7495> my soul; <WH5315> for <WH3588> I have sinned <WH2398> against thee.
Mine enemies <WH341> speak <WH559> evil <WH7451> of me, When <WH4970> shall he die, <WH4191> and his name <WH8034> perish? <WH6>

And if <WH518> he come <WH935> to see <WH7200> me, he speaketh <WH1696> vanity: <WH7723> his heart <WH3820> gathereth <WH6908> iniquity <WH205> to itself; when he goeth <WH3318> abroad, <WH2351> he telleth <WH1696> it.
All <WH3605> that hate <WH8130> me whisper <WH3907> together <WH3162> against <WH5921> me: against <WH5921> me do they devise <WH2803> my hurt. <WH7451>
An evil <WH1100> disease, <WH1697> say they, cleaveth fast <WH3332> unto him: and now that <WH834> he lieth <WH7901> he shall rise up <WH6965> no <WH3808> more. <WH3254>
Yea, <WH1571> mine own familiar friend, <WH7965> <WH376> in whom <WH834> I trusted, <WH982> which did eat <WH398> of my bread, <WH3899> hath lifted up <WH1431> his heel <WH6119> against <WH5921> me.
But thou, <WH859> O LORD, <WH3068> be merciful <WH2603> unto me, and raise me up, <WH6965> that I may requite <WH7999> them.
By this <WH2063> I know <WH3045> that <WH3588> thou favorest <WH2654> me, because <WH3588> mine enemy <WH341> doth not <WH3808> triumph <WH7321> over <WH5921> me.
And as for me, <WH589> thou upholdest <WH8551> me in mine integrity, <WH8537> and settest <WH5324> me before thy face <WH6440> forever. <WH5769>
Blessed <WH1288> be the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478> from everlasting, <WH4480> <WH5769> and to <WH5704> everlasting. <WH5769> Amen, <WH543> and Amen. <WH543>
